<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Radiant Beam](/Spells.aspx?ID=1123)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 94

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 120-foot line

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You fire a beam of blinding light from your outstretched hands. The beam deals 5d10 good damage. On a failed saving throw, a creature becomes [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round, or dazzled for 4 rounds on a critical failure.

 If the light passes through an area of magical [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, radiant beam attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the darkness. If you need to determine whether the light passes through an area of darkness, draw a line between yourself and the target.

---
**Heightened (+1)**  The damage increases by 1d10.
name: Radiant Beam
